Function reference

All functions

colour_choicesUI() colour_choices()
Shiny module for picking colours
coord_geo()
Co-ordinates for geofield geoms
dashboard_point_verifUI() dashboard_point_verif()
Shiny module for point verification dashboard
download_verif_plotUI() download_verif_plot()
Download module for point verification plots in a Shiny app
geom_geocontour() geom_geocontour_filled()
2d contours of a geofield
geom_georaster()
2d image of a geofield
geom_linespline() stat_linespline()
Connect control points/observations with an X-spline
geom_ribbonspline() stat_ribbonspline()
Connect control points/observations with an X-spline
get_map()
Get map data for a given geodomain
group_selectorsUI() group_selectors()
Shiny module for selecting values for verification groups
interactive_point_verifUI() interactive_point_verif()
Shiny module for interactively showing point verification scores
options_barUI() options_bar()
Module for reading harp verification files in a Shiny app
plot_field()
Plot a harp_fcst 2d field
plot_point_verif()
Plot verification scores
plot_profile_verif()
Plot verification scores for vertical profiles
plot_scatter()
Scatter plot of forecast vs observations
plot_scorecard()
Plot a scorecard from bootstrapped verification
plot_spatial_verif()
Plot spatial verification scores
plot_station_eps()
Plot eps data for a station
plot_station_ts()
Plot a time series for point data
plot_vertical_profile()
Plot a vertical profile
score_lookup()
Convert a score from a long name to a short name, or vice versa
shiny_plot_point_verif()
Start shiny app to plot point verification
shiny_plot_spatial_verif()
Start shiny app to plot spatial verification
time_axis()
Shiny server for selecting time axis
time_axisUI()
Shiny UI for selecting time axis
verif_data_det
Deterministic verification scores example data.
verif_data_ens
Ensemble verification scores example data.
verif_data_grp
Grouped verification scores example data
verif_data_prf
Deterministic verification scores for vertical profile example data.

Developed by Andrew Singleton.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
